408: Microsoft Cloud Operations + Innovation is the team behind the cloud. CO+I is responsible for delivering over 200 Microsoft web portals, Live and Online Services around the world including infrastructure, security and compliance, operations, globalization, and manageability. Our focus is on growth, high efficiency, and delivering a trusted experience to customers and partners worldwide. We are looking for a passionate, high-energy individual to help build the network that powers the world’s largest online services. The Infrastructure Planning and Acquisition Center of Excellence team (IPA CoE) is responsible for enabling and optimizing the foundation that supports infrastructure delivery for Land, Energy, Networking, Datacenter Planning and Cost Management through efficient processes, data driven decision making, innovation, and automated and integrated tool sets. As a Customer Experience Program Manager, you will drive technology programs to build the next generation of core services for our organization and serve as a key stakeholder for driving master data management strategy across key IPA functions. In this role you will be the liaison for the Land Acquisition business stakeholders and our internal engineering teams. You will understand customer goals, unmet needs, and customer pain points; and turn them into high quality requirements, driving the project to successful delivery in a highly collaborative fashion. You will also be responsible for partnering with the Business Architecture team to create and execute on the roadmap for Master Data Management and establish Master Data Governance processes. Additionally, you will enable quality and scalable technology solutions with the right level of flexibility for land and master data management, while simultaneously ensuring successful development, implementation and adoption of developed technologies with customer focus and innovative team culture being at the forefront.
